title: Full Auto USA XBOX360-RADIAN
description:
DEVELOPER(S):  Pseudo Interactive

PUBLISHER(S): Sega

YEAR PUBLISHED: 2006

LANGUAGE(S): Eng

FILES:

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: XBOX 360


Synopsis

Combine raw horsepower with awesome firepower in a race that demands both precision aim and breakneck speed. Destroy your enemies and tear the world apart as you master a wide arsenal of weaponry and a stunning selection of armor-laden cars. Xbox Live support ensures significant replay value for gamers itching to take on human opponents in both grand-scale arena modes and full-throttle races.   

Description

* Next Generation Technology. Advanced, proprietary technology provides play mechanics, animations, modelling and A.I. that are simply unparalleled.



* Persistent Action and Realism NO pre-calculated, canned responses or animations. You will never see the same wreck twice!



* Advanced Collision Physics Damage, deform and demolish cars and buildings in ways you've never seen before.



* Multi-player support with up to 4 players per Xbox 360 and up to 8 players over Xbox Live.



* Armed and Dangerous Intense combat with 20+ armed vehicles. 5 Fully loaded series with dynamic upgrades and real-time procedural damage.



* "Unwreck" - Manipulate time. Rewind & recover or slow time to tighten your aim. Avoid crashes and missed opportunities, then show off your best moments in highlight reels.
